verses.verse: The burden <WH4853> of TZor <WH6865>. Howl <WH3213> <WH8685>, ye ships <WH591> of Tarshish <WH8659>; for it is laid waste <WH7703> <WH8795>, so that there is no house <WH1004>, no entering in <WH935> <WH8800>: from the land <WH776> of Chittim <WH3794> it is revealed <WH1540> <WH8738> to them.

Be still <WH1826> <WH8798>, ye inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the isle <WH339>; thou whom the merchants <WH5503> <WH8802> of Zidon <WH6721>, that pass over <WH5674> <WH8802> the sea <WH3220>, have replenished <WH4390> <WH8765>.
And by great <WH7227> waters <WH4325> the seed <WH2233> of Sihor <WH7883>, the harvest <WH7105> of the river <WH2975>, is her revenue <WH8393>; and she is a mart <WH5505> of nations <WH1471>.

Be thou ashamed <WH954> <WH8798>, O Zidon <WH6721>: for the sea <WH3220> hath spoken <WH559> <WH8804>, even the strength <WH4581> of the sea <WH3220>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, I travail <WH2342> <WH8804> not, nor bring forth children <WH3205> <WH8804>, neither do I nourish up <WH1431> <WH8765> young men <WH970>, nor bring up <WH7311> <WH8790> virgins <WH1330>.
As at the report <WH8088> concerning Egypt <WH4714>, so shall they be sorely pained <WH2342> <WH8799> at the report <WH8088> of TZor <WH6865>.
Pass ye over <WH5674> <WH8798> to Tarshish <WH8659>; howl <WH3213> <WH8685>, ye inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the isle <WH339>.

Is this your joyous <WH5947> city, whose antiquity <WH6927> is of ancient <WH6924> days <WH3117>? her own feet <WH7272> shall carry <WH2986> <WH8686> her afar off <WH7350> to sojourn <WH1481> <WH8800>.

Who hath taken this counsel <WH3289> <WH8804> against TZor <WH6865>, the crowning <WH5849> <WH8688> city, whose merchants <WH5503> <WH8802> are princes <WH8269>, whose traffickers <WH3667> are the honourable <WH3513> <WH8737> of the earth <WH776> ?

The YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> hath purposed <WH3289> <WH8804> it, to stain <WH2490> <WH8763> the pride <WH1347> of all glory <WH6643>, and to bring into contempt <WH7043> <WH8687> all the honourable <WH3513> <WH8737> of the earth <WH776>.
Pass <WH5674> <WH8798> through thy land <WH776> as a river <WH2975>, O daughter <WH1323> of Tarshish <WH8659>: there is no more strength <WH4206>.

He stretched out <WH5186> <WH8804> his hand <WH3027> over the sea <WH3220>, he shook <WH7264> <WH8689> the kingdoms <WH4467>: the YY <WH3068> hath given a Mitzvah <WH6680> <WH8765> against the merchant <WH3667> city, to destroy <WH8045> <WH8687> the strong <WH4581> holds <WH4581> thereof.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Thou shalt no more <WH3254> <WH8686> rejoice <WH5937> <WH8800>, O thou oppressed <WH6231> <WH8794> virgin <WH1330>, daughter <WH1323> of Zidon <WH6721>: arise <WH6965> <WH8798>, pass over <WH5674> <WH8798> to Chittim <WH3794>; there also shalt thou have no rest <WH5117> <WH8799>.

Behold the land <WH776> of the Chaldeans <WH3778>; this people <WH5971> was not, till the Ashurn <WH804> founded <WH3245> <WH8804> it for them that dwell in the wilderness <WH6728>: they set up <WH6965> <WH8689> the towers <WH971> thereof, they raised up <WH6209> <WH8782> the palaces <WH759> thereof; and he brought <WH7760> <WH8804> it to ruin <WH4654>.
Howl <WH3213> <WH8685>, ye ships <WH591> of Tarshish <WH8659>: for your strength <WH4581> is laid waste <WH7703> <WH8795>.

And it shall come to pass in that day <WH3117>, that TZor <WH6865> shall be forgotten <WH7911> <WH8737> seventy <WH7657> years <WH8141>, according to the days <WH3117> of one <WH259> king <WH4428>: after the end <WH7093> of seventy <WH7657> years <WH8141> shall TZor <WH6865> sing <WH7892> as an harlot <WH2181> <WH8802>.

Take <WH3947> <WH8798> an harp <WH3658>, go about <WH5437> <WH8798> the city <WH5892>, thou harlot <WH2181> <WH8802> that hast been forgotten <WH7911> <WH8737>; make sweet <WH3190> <WH8685> melody <WH5059> <WH8763>, sing many <WH7235> <WH8685> songs <WH7892>, that thou mayest be remembered <WH2142> <WH8735>.

And it shall come to pass after the end <WH7093> of seventy <WH7657> years <WH8141>, that the YY <WH3068> will visit <WH6485> <WH8799> TZor <WH6865>, and she shall turn <WH7725> <WH8804> to her hire <WH868>, and shall commit fornication <WH2181> <WH8804> with all the kingdoms <WH4467> of the world <WH776> upon the face <WH6440> of the earth <WH127>.

And her merchandise <WH5504> and her hire <WH868> shall be holiness <WH6944> to the YY <WH3068>: it shall not be treasured <WH686> <WH8735> nor laid up <WH2630> <WH8735>; for her merchandise <WH5504> shall be for them that dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, to eat <WH398> <WH8800> sufficiently <WH7654>, and for durable <WH6266> clothing <WH4374>.
